=======
Changes
=======

0.5.1 (2013-07-18)
------------------

- feature: support validation for fields applied in updateWidgets method and
  not defined at class level

- bugfix: Apply error message exactly how z3c.form does and override existing
  errors given from z3c.form


0.5.0 (2012-11-17)
------------------

- initial release
